info.description: REST API for configuring FortiOS objects and settings
info.title: FortiOS Service

get.summary:
Retrieve a list of N number of PSIRT advisories that the Security Fabric is vulnerable to for a given severity. 
 Access Group: sysgrp.mnt

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

schema.title: PSIRT Critical Vulnerabilities
schema.description: List of PSIRT critical vulnerabilities for the firmware currently installed.

name.title: PSIRT Critical Vulnerability Name
name.description: The name for the PSIRT critical vulnerability.

irNumber.title: IR Number
irNumber.description: IR number to identify the critical vulnerability.

serial.title: Device ID
serial.description: ID to identify the vulnerable device.

severity.title: Severity
severity.description: Severity of the Security Rating check.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

get.summary:
Checks whether the other FortiGate device's time in the Security Fabric is in sync with the specified utc timestamp (in seconds) 
 Access Group: any

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

schema.title: Fabric Time Sync
schema.description: Result of checking whether the specified timestamp, in seconds, is almost same as the device at the time when the request was received. It is considered almost the same if the difference is within 2 minutes.

synchronized.title: Synchronized
synchronized.description: True if the specified timestamp, in seconds, is almost the same as the device's current time as the time of receiving the request.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

parameters.name: utc
parameters.description: UTC, in seconds, to check against to see if the device's current time is syncronized with.

get.summary:
Check if there exists a FortiGate in the Fabric that has an administrative user that will get locked out if firmware is updated to a version that does not support safer passwords. 
 Access Group: any

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

schema.title: Fabric Admin Lockout on Firmware Update
schema.description: Result of checking whether a FortiGate in the Fabric has a administrative user that will get locked out if the device's firmware version gets updated to a version that does not support safer passwords.

exists.title: Exists
exists.description: True if there is at least 1 admin that will get locked out if the device's firmware version gets updated to a version that does not support safer passwords.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.
